en.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner Vietnam 11th July 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam on 11th July 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 600 Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests. There were around a dozen PDs from Malaysia who attended. It is great to see their network growing strongly in Vietnam. Among the VIPs who attended are FE Founder CEO, Paul Ting, well known Rtd General Le Thanh Hai, Chairman of Ho Chi Minh City Foundation For The Poor, Madam Le Thi Van, former Mayor of Ho Chi Minh City and now Chairman of Thien Nhan Charity Foundation, Mr Duong Quat, prominent politician and Chairman of Quang Tri Foundation For Disabled and Orphans, FE Vietnam Spokesman Ly Duc, FE Malaysia Spokesman Wong Hong, FE Consultant Master Yap, etc. 

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Cultural Dance by Vietnam Dance Troupe.

- Welcome Speech by Vietnam Country Licensee, Doan Nguyen. 

- Signing Ceremony on Cooperation between FusionExcel and Ho Chi Minh City Foundation For The Poor,
  represented by its Chairman Rtd General Le Thanh Hai.

- Speech by Rtd General Le Thanh Hai.

- Speech by Madam Le Thi Van, former Mayor Ho Chi Minh City and Chairman of Thien Nhan Foundation
  who spoke on the role of social entrepreneurs in society, as promoted by FE.

- Product Talk and Demonstrations by Master Yap who as usual did a great job demonstrating the power of
  FE's Quantum Pendant to the audience. 

- QP Testimonial by FE's Vietnam Spokesman, Champion Body Builder and former Mr Vietnam, Ly Duc.

- VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) Mock Cheque Presentation to Quang Tri Province Foundation For Disabled
  and Orphans represented by its Chairman Mr Duong Quat.

- Speech by Mr Duong Quat.

- Quantum Pendant Presentation to Ho Chi Minh Foundation For The Poor,
  represented by its Chairman, Rtd General Le Thanh Hai.

- QP Testimonial by Vietnam Paralympics Athlete.

- Installation of Vietnam Directors by Paul Ting.

- Success Sharing by FE's Presidential Director KC Phoon. 

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to Vietnam Country Licensee Doan Nguyen and his team for organizing yet another great event! 
 
< Click Here For More Photos >
